Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

i'm trying to dive deeper into image processing and astro photography. The plan is to upgrade to a monitor with 3840*2160 resolution. Video/movie is not an issue, response time less important to me than contrast and colour reproduction. Size between 30 and 34 inches, price should be under 1k funds. Graphics card is a gtx 970 compatible.

Maybe someone has an ear on the market or read an independent test lately and could give me a hint ?

cheers

gb
i like my 4k for cad and image processing, which is the only place they really shine. not so great with gaming as its hard to make all those pixels happy.
